author: CathyBennett030313
title: New York New York -
text: Arrived 8pm ish 3rd March 2017 check in quick. Stayed in room 535 so had a great view of the theatres. Room had two double beds bathroom with bath which was great. Very quite and very clean. Lovely reception area. Also room to store cases on last day small charge for this. Location fab turn left and walk few minutes your on Time Square. ABSOLUTELY loved our stay and bed was so comfy. Thank you for a lovely hotel to stay in.
